text: Hi as im new to HubSpot as a web developer can you guys give me some suggestions to build a template from scratch
Hi again, I've now created a child theme but when selected i can't see any of the parents templates :S
NVM, my dev account did't have the child theme function. Worked on the production account. :slightly_smiling_face:
Here is a good place to start: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-themes>
